source:
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_00One cannot excavate on an empty stomach, as Qhoterl Pasol well knows.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe
* Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe qui a servi à la commencer.

Qhoterl Pasol voudrait que vous lui rapportiez des ingrédients.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_01<tab>Livrer ce qui vous a été demandé à Qhoterl Pasol

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid ant eggs at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid ant eggs to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid silkworms at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid silkworms to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch a splendid robber crab at the Lozatl)) ((Deliver the splendid robber crab to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Extraire <var 33 ((Item)) 02E8060302 /var> à la Nostalgie de Mjrl)) ((Livrer <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> à Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Récolter <var 33 ((Item)) 02E8060302 /var> à la Nostalgie de Mjrl)) ((Livrer <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> à Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Pêcher <var 33 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> dans la Lozatl)) ((Livrer <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> à Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Digging is whisker-warping work, as I'm sure you will agree. If one is to keep at it day in and day out, one must have good, nourishing meals.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Excavation user beaucouuup de forces<var 1D /var>! Besoin de se remplir le ventre ré<var 16 /var>gu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment pour maintenir rythme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>If you're willing, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, might I trouble you to bring some ingredients so that I can prepare a hearty meal for everyone? My Chaqurl, in particular, is still a growing boy, and few things please me more than to see his belly full and round.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>Mais nourrir tout le monde pas évident évident<var 1D /var>! Gentil<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> bien vouuuloir ramener miam miam<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>For the dish I plan to make, I still require three ant eggs. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to dig them up readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>Qhoterl Pasol vouloir trois <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF273500302 /var>. Toi pouvoir extraire ça à la Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>For the dish I plan to make, I still require three silkworms. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to gather them readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>Qhoterl Pasol vouloir trois <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF2736A0302 /var>. Toi pouvoir récolter ça à la Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>For the dish I plan to make, I still require a robber crab. If you fish at the Lozatl using fruit worms, I daresay they'll bite readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>Qhoterl Pasol vouloir <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF273840202 /var>. Toi pouvoir pêcher ça avec <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26BBE0202 /var> dans la Lozatl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_010<tab>Three ant eggs ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to dig them up readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_010<tab>Qhoterl Pasol vouloir trois <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF273500302 /var>. Toi pouvoir extraire ça à la Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_020<tab>Three silkworms ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to gather them readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_020<tab>Qhoterl Pasol vouloir trois <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF2736A0302 /var>. Toi pouvoir récolter ça à la Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_030<tab>One robber crab ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you fish at the Lozatl using fruit worms as bait, I daresay they'll bite readily enough.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_030<tab>Qhoterl Pasol vouloir <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF273840202 /var>. Toi pouvoir pêcher ça avec <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26BBE0202 /var> dans la Lozatl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_050<tab>How fares the procuring effort, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_060<tab>Ah, splendid! I shall stew these eggs with spices and serve them with cornbread.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_060<tab>Merci merci<var 1D /var>! Bons gros œufs brouillés dans sandwich faire régal des Qitari<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_061<tab>A delectable combination, as my Chaqurl will attest. He doesn't leave so much as a single crumb behind!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_061<tab>Surtouuut de mon fils<var 1D /var>! Si lui continuer comme ça, lui finir gros, hi hi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_070<tab>Ah, splendid! Plump and fresh as they are, these silkworms are best prepared simply─fried and salted.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_070<tab>Merci merci<var 1D /var>! Nymphes bien fraîches saupouuudrées de sel faire régal des Qitari<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_071<tab>If there's a way to my husband's stomach, I can say with confidence that this dish is it. The shine in his eyes doesn't lie!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_071<tab>Surtouuut de mon mari<var 1D /var>! Si lui continuer comme ça, lui finir encore plus gros, hi hi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_080<tab>Ah, splendid! I shall boil this crab whole with vegetables and serve it with steamed grains!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_080<tab>Merci merci<var 1D /var>! Crabe voleur avec légumes et céréales grillées faire régal des Qitari<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_081<tab>I'm not too proud to admit that this is my personal favorite. Ah, the mere thought of it makes my mouth water... <slurp>
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_081<tab>Surtout Qhoterl Pasol<var 1D /var>! À chaque fois que voir crabe voleur, salive affluer à la bouuuuche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_090<tab>Without further ado, I shall set about preparing the meal. We are all in for a treat, and it is thanks to you, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_090<tab>Oooh, déjà être heure de préparer repas<var 1D /var>! Merci encore, gentil<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!
